attributes.action: Free prescription medication for those with Inflammatory Bowel Disease.
attributes.additional_details:
Common symptoms include

-diarrhoea
-Constipation 
-fever. 
-vitamin deficiency 
-Extreme chronic fatigue 
-Abdominal pain & Cramping
-Bloody stools
-ulceration in the mouth, stomach, Large bowel
-Unintended weight fluctuations 

Other symptoms include:
-Chronic inflammation of joins and painful joints.
-Nausea
-Vomitting
-Irritated eyes (uveitis)
-Red sore & often swollen skin
-Mouth Ulcers
attributes.background: Inflammatory Bowel Diseases are a group of chronic (no cure) illnesses that affect the digestive system. The two main of these are Ulcerative Colitis & Crohn's disease. A person with these illness may not look sick outwardly but inside be ravaged and in unimaginable pain. Research symptoms for more
